name: Wise Package Studio Merge Module
summary: Learn about .WSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Files can be added or removed from WSM packages using Wise Package Studio. Once a package has been modified, it must be recompiled into a merge module by Wise Package Studio in order to function correctly.
WSM files are similar to .MSM files, but are used specifically by Wise Package Studio.
NOTE: Symantec discontinued Wise Installation Studio and Wise Installation Express on April 19, 2010.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
